Metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25576 affecting package kata-containers for versions less than 3.2.0.azl2-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2020-25576 affecting package kata-containers for versions less than 3.2.0.azl2-3. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package kata-containers is earlier than 3.2.0.azl2-3, affected by CVE-2020-25576
